snippet: The architect Peter Samton reflects on the legacy of Ada Louise Huxtable, onetime architecture critic for The New York Times.
lead_paragraph: The architect Peter Samton reflects on the legacy of Ada Louise Huxtable, onetime architecture critic for The New York Times.

headline.seo: Ada Louise Huxtable: A Catalyst for New York City’s Rebirth
